title: GitHub Basics: Mastering Version Control and Collaboration
summary: Master the fundamentals of Git and GitHub: version control, repositories, branches, commits, pull requests, staging area, and essential CLI commands for modern development.

title: GitHub Advanced: Actions, Workflows, and Open Source Contribution
summary: Master advanced Git and GitHub: GitHub Actions, CI/CD workflows, .gitignore, pre-commit hooks, contributing to open source, releases, tags, and GitHub Packages.

title: LangGraph Agent to HTML Blog Generator: Building Blogs with AI
summary: Learn how to generate HTML blog posts from Jupyter notebooks using LangChain, LangGraph, and Ollama. This post walks through loading, retrieving, reasoning, and generating structured blog content with a full pipeline.

title: Graph-Powered RAG with LangChain, Chroma DB, and Gemma 3
summary: Build an advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline using LangGraph and Gemma 3 model with detailed code and visualization.

title: Building a RAG Pipeline with PDFs, Chroma DB, and Gemma 3
summary: Step-by-step guide to building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline using LangChain, HuggingFace embeddings, and your own PDF (resume) as a knowledge base.

title: LangChain Document Loaders: A Unified Gateway to Your Data
summary: Explore how to use LangChain's powerful document loaders to bring in data from PDFs, websites, YouTube, CSVs, Notion, and even structured JSON with just a few lines of code.

title: LangChain + Ollama: Your Gateway to LLM Apps, Explained with Code
summary: This blog walks through how to build with LangChain and Ollama covering chat vs. completion models, prompt templates, and hands-on code to get started fast.

title: Decision Tree Regressor from Scratch: Split, Predict, Repeat
summary: Explore how decision trees make predictions by learning to split data based on error reduction. This guide walks through a full tree regressor implementation in Python.

title: Lasso Regression from Scratch: Feature Selection Meets Regularization
summary: Learn how to implement Lasso Regression using Coordinate Descent from scratch, and explore how L1 regularization leads to feature selection in high-dimensional data.

title: Ridge Regression from Scratch: With Gradient Descent and L2 Regularization
summary: Explore how to implement Ridge Regression using gradient descent from scratch. Learn why regularization matters and compare performance against OLS and SGD models.

title: Linear Regression from Scratch: With Gradient Descent
summary: This blog breaks down gradient descent like never before and walks you through building your own predictive model from scratch. Simple, sharp, and hands-on.

title: Mastering Linear Regression with OLS: A Hands-On Guide Using California Housing Data
summary: Dive deep into Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) linear regression with a real-world dataset. This blog walks you through each step from loading data to evaluating model performance.

title: Binary Search Trees in Python: From Scratch
summary: Learn how to implement a Binary Search Tree (BST) from scratch in Python, covering insertion, search, deletion, traversal, and visualization.

title: Grid Traversal Algorithms: BFS vs DFS Explained with Code
summary: Learn how to implement and visualize Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Depth-First Search (DFS) on a 2D matrix. This beginner-friendly guide walks you through both algorithms with code, output, and a comparison table.

title: Deep Dive: Functions in Our Hindi Wikipedia Scraper
summary: Have you ever wondered how to automatically retrieve and clean Hindi text from Wikipedia? This post walks through the requests and BeautifulSoup modules and explains each function in a reusable scraper class, ending with the full ready-to-run code.

title: Understanding pyproject.toml: The Modern Python Project Configuration File
summary: Master pyproject.toml - the unified configuration standard for Python projects. Learn structure, benefits, tool configurations, migration from setup.py, and best practices.

title: Mastering Pytest: A Deep Dive into Decorators and Advanced Testing
summary: Unlock the full power of pytest by mastering its decorator system. Learn @pytest.mark.parametrize, @pytest.fixture, custom markers, and 10+ essential decorators with practical examples.

title: Ruff: The Blazingly Fast Python Linter and Formatter
summary: Master Ruff, the all-in-one Python linting and formatting tool that's 10-100x faster than traditional tools. Learn how to replace Flake8, Black, isort, and more with a single command.

title: UV: The Lightning-Fast Python Package Manager
summary: Discover UV, the blazingly fast Python package manager built in Rust. Learn how it's 10-100x faster than pip and why it's becoming the go-to tool for modern Python development.

title: Sorting Algorithms Demystified: Visualized and Benchmarked in Python
summary: Explore and compare Bubble, Insertion, Selection, Merge, and Quick Sort through Python code, visual benchmarks, and complexity analysis.

title: Exploring Search Algorithms: From Linear to Binary
summary: Learn the fundamentals of Linear and Binary Search algorithms, their implementation in Python, and when to use each. Includes step-by-step code and comparison.

title: Setting Up Ollama
summary: Get started with Ollama, a no-token, local-friendly way to run LLMs on your machine. Setup steps and essential commands included.

title: Setting Up Your Python Environment
summary: A beginner-friendly guide to creating and managing Python virtual environments, installing packages, and using pip effectively.

title: Pandas Part 1: From Installation to Data Cleaning
summary: Master Pandas fundamentals: installation, data structures, reading/writing files, data cleaning, and filtering operations for effective data manipulation in Python.

title: Pandas Part 2: Joins and GroupBy Operations
summary: Master Pandas joins, merges, and GroupBy operations: inner/left/right/outer joins, multi-key merges, aggregations, transforms, pivot tables, and window functions.

title: Pandas Part 3: Advanced Data Engineering
summary: Master advanced Pandas techniques: data partitioning, chunking, memory optimization, parallel processing, vectorization, and production-ready best practices for data engineering.

title: NumPy Complete Guide: From Arrays to Advanced Computing
summary: Master NumPy from basics to advanced: arrays, operations, indexing, slicing, broadcasting, linear algebra, and performance optimization for numerical computing in Python.

title: Hello World! My First Blog Post
summary: Kicking off my blog with excitement and a glimpse of what's to come. Let the journey begin!
